dialog_1.name: UNKNOWN
dialog_1.text: A true code mage must master every dialect!

dialog_3.name: TEACHER
dialog_3.text: Now I'll show you the ancient texts: C

dialog_5.name: TEACHER
dialog_5.text: In the world of C, to make the console sing,

dialog_9.name: TEACHER
dialog_9.text: For your first spell, I will teach you

dialog_10.name: TEACHER
dialog_10.text: how to make the machine greet the world

dialog_14.name: TEACHER
dialog_14.text: Onwards to C++! Here the spell for speech is 'cout'

dialog_17.name: TEACHER
dialog_17.text: 'cout' flows with double arrows << pushing your message

dialog_18.name: TEACHER
dialog_18.text: into the world. Remember to not miss a semicolon!

dialog_19.name: TEACHER
dialog_19.text: else the goblins of syntax error may appear!

dialog_20.name: TEACHER
dialog_20.text: Speak with code and the system shall answer

dialog_21.name: TEACHER
dialog_21.text: The might of C and C++ awaits!
